Detailed Description

Sample config file.

This is a sample configuration file for a typical setup (in this case for example.com). There are many more possible configuration values. This file just covers the most common ones.

License:
http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
Link:
http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework

Version:

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum BOO_AES_KEY

The key used for MySQL AES_ENCRYPT and AES_DECRYPT.

Warning:
Be sure to change the default key.

Definition at line 49 of file example.com.php.

enum BOO_DEBUG

Debug mode.

Set to FALSE in production environment.

Warning:
Enabling debug mode can cause sensitive information to be displayed. It should only be used in a private environment.

Definition at line 29 of file example.com.php.

enum BOO_DOMAIN

Your domain name.

Definition at line 20 of file example.com.php.

enum BOO_PRODUCTION

Production mode.

Set to TRUE in production enviroment. This will enable optimizing and other features that are not normaly done.

Definition at line 37 of file example.com.php.

enum BOO_SMTP_ENC

SMTP server encryption.

  • 2 = TLS
  • 4 = SSL
  • 8 = Unencrypted
